CRYSTAL BALL.Definition: a way to guess what might happen in the future

SLOGAN.Definition: a short and memorable phrase used to express an idea

HEADWINDS.Definition: problems or challenges that make progress difficult

AUTONOMOUS.Definition: independent and able to make decisions on their own

BALANCE ITS OWN BOOKS.Definition: manage its money so that it doesn't spend more than it has

UNDERGRADUATE.Definition: a student studying for their first degree at university

VETERINARY SCIENCE.Definition: the study of medicine for animals

HUMANITIES.Definition: subjects like history, literature, and philosophy that study human culture

NOMINAL.Definition: very small or slight in amount

PLUG THE GAP.Definition: fill the shortage or solve the problem by adding what's missing

SHORTFALL.Definition: an amount that is less than the level that is needed

SUBSIDISE.Definition: to help pay for part of the cost of it

ALL FINE AND DANDY.Definition: all good, but maybe only on the surface

PAY THROUGH THE NOSE.Definition: pay too much money for it

SPOUSAL.Definition: related to a husband or wife

CASH COWS.Definition: things or people that make a lot of money for them

DEFICIT.Definition: a total amount by which money spent is more than money received

TOP-TIER.Definition: the highest level or best quality

PULL.Definition: influence or power to attract people

DOWNWARD SPIRAL.Definition: a situation that gets worse and worse

ENROLMENTS.Definition: the number of people who sign up for a course

STRIKE.Definition: a period when they stopped working to protest for better conditions

PENSIONS.Definition: money paid to people after they retire from work

UNDERPAID.Definition: not paid enough money for the work done

ALUMNI.Definition: people who have graduated from a university

DECEPTIVE.Definition: misleading or giving a false impression

VOCATIONAL.Definition: relating to training for a specific job

BROAD.Definition: covering a wide range of subjects or areas

BURDEN.Definition: something that causes worry or difficulty

GONE BANKRUPT.Definition: lost all money and been unable to pay debts
